nml_option.name: config_AM_zonalMean_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member zonal_mean is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_zonalMean_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_zonalMean_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member output occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_zonalMean_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Interval that determines frequency of computation for the zonal mean analysis member.

nml_option.name: config_AM_zonalMean_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of stream the zonal mean analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_zonalMean_num_bins
nml_option.description: Number of bins used for zonal mean. Must be less than or equal to the dimension nZonalMeanBins (set in Registry).
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer value less than or equal to nZonalMeanBins.

nml_option.name: config_AM_zonalMean_min_bin
nml_option.description: minimum bin boundary value. If set to -1.0e34, the minimum value in the domain is found.

nml_option.name: config_AM_zonalMean_max_bin
nml_option.description: maximum bin boundary value. If set to -1.0e34, the maximum value in the domain is found.

dim.name: nZonalMeanBins
dim.description: Number of bins for zonal mean.

dim.name: nZonalMeanBinsP1
dim.description: Number of bins for zonal mean, plus one.

package.name: zonalMeanAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the zonalMean analysis member.

var.name: binCenterZonalMean
var.description: Central coordinate of zonal mean bin, either in latitude or y, for plotting.

var.name: binBoundaryZonalMean
var.description: Coordinate of lower edge of zonal mean bin, either in latitude or y, for plotting.

var.name: velocityZonalZonalMean
var.description: Zonal mean of component of horizontal velocity in the eastward direction

var.name: velocityMeridionalZonalMean
var.description: Zonal mean of component of horizontal velocity in the northward direction
